Reviews.Title: “Avoid this hotel if you do not want to spoil your holiday”
Reviews.Author: sahar o
Reviews.Content: agree alison julia poor service furniture bed comfortable noisy fountain tourists sleep due noise paid 230 euro night 3 star hotel absolutely service called view window price expecting average breakfast clean own table complained breakfast told wait brought house serve breakfast manager rude unbelievable unfortunately remember beautiful trevi fountain terrible memory rome

Reviews.Title: “Great view,shocking service.”

Reviews.Content: fantastic location appalling breakfast morning clean table cleared juice pastries actually wasnt guest phoned manager help arrived upstairs front guests told wait rude manner nice view window noisybut fit bath shower nozzle definitely choose stay
